message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_FORM_EVIDENCE_NAME_FV_EMPTY
message.locale: The evidence name must not be empty.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_FORM_EVIDENCE_TYPE_FV_EMPTY
message.locale: The case evidence type must not be empty.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCEFORM_XRV_EXISTING_EVIDFORM
message.locale: An evidence form with the same or overlapping date periods already exists.
